post.text: Anyone who sees and treats women this way is unfit to be president.

comment.author: Rachel
comment.text: Why aren't u talking about Trump's rape case in December?

replies.author: Keegan
replies.text: Because that didn't come out until after you started running for president that is a 20 year old story and there's no proof to the allegation

replies.author: Aidan
replies.text: I mean, no proof except the eyewitnesses with the signed affadavit...
